creator: paint007@mc.duke.edu
text:
According to servlet2.2 javadocs 
(http://java.sun.com/products/servlet/2.2/javadoc/index.html), 
HttpServletRequest should have a public method getLocale(), which returns the 
user's preferred locale.  This doesn't seem to be implemented.

I am using Cocoon 1.8.2 with Tomcat 3.2.2.  The bug exists in Tomcat 3.2.1 and 
3.2.2, as far as I can tell.

-Christopher
